content: We only have 2 tracks so far for the January connectathon - this seems a little light...
Added Terminology Services - although I wasn't sure if it had the 'approved' status yet.

BTW - we had a good response to our deadline for getting track submissions in (We have 13 to date) but to be sure that everyone who wants to submit a track proposal has the opportunity to do so, we've extended the deadline by 2 weeks to November 1st...

@David Hay and @Grahame Grieve The extended deadline expired on Nov 1st, but the main connectathon page has not been updated with planned tracks. As was done by several track leads, I updated this page to include the Care Plan track after receiving queries about status from several interested participants. It would be good to update this list with all planned tracks.
@David Hay did this get discussed in FMG?
yes - I'm going to update the CT page...

and done! there are 23 tracks. The ones I didn't include didn't look complete. These were:

  • Consumer Centered Data Exchange
  • Devices
  • IHE on FHIR

Prospective attendees were beginning to write justifications for funding to attend the connectathon and missing "official" tracks may have impacted those approvals. So we all thank you for making the list official :-)
David, please include those three too. They are all under development
OK. Added them in with an 'under development' note...
